Hello,

I am curious if anyone might have compiled any stats with regards t=
o 
how much duplicate content is likely to appear in repeat domain 
crawls.=
  In our case, we are crawling a Government domain that is 
approximately 1=
,500 seeds and 2TB in size.  We plan to crawl twice a 
year and obviously a=
 lot of content will not change across these crawls 
resulting in many dupl=
icates (I've noticed some sites have not been 
updated since 2004!).

It'd =
be great to hear if anyone has analyzed this type of question 
before (part=
icularly with Government domains).  We would like to use 
this info to esti=
mate how much space / bandwidth will be needed when 
repeating domain crawl=
s with a "smart" crawler that uses deduplication.

cheers
Adam
